alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Jasper; Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 03 at 5:49AM CDT until April 03 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN JASPER...SOUTHWESTERN CLARKE AND NORTHEASTERN JONES COUNTIES... At 549 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Sandersville, or 10 miles east of Stringer, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Heidelberg around 600 AM CDT. Stafford Springs around 605 AM CDT. Goodwater around 610 AM CDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
